HTTP Routing Table

/movements
 
/movements
GET /movements List of all movements
GET /movements/{movementId} Get a movement
POST /movements Create a new movement
PUT /movements/{movementId}/subscriber Subscribe user to movement
DELETE /movements/{movementId}/subscriber Unsubscribe user from movement
